Btw, my tops are kinda glitched, like u can see the shirt through it on the shoulders

Is there any way to fix this? Thanks! :o[/quote]

yea, in item.java (serverside)
you have to add the tops ID to both int platebody and int body

item.title: New Inifinity Robes [no models needed!] [only 2 of 4 done]
item.dc:creator: @staypuff staypuff
item.description:
@staypuff wrote:

[center]

Insert these into class8.java (client side) then don’t forget to put the ID’s into the right spots in item.java (serverside) to make them equip properly.[/center]

Blue:

if(i == ####) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[6]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[6]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 55977; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 40854; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 695; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 40847; class8.anIntArray156[2] = 35365; class8.anIntArray160[2] = 40859; class8.anIntArray156[3] = 24512; class8.anIntArray160[3] = 37786; class8.anIntArray156[4] = 46016; class8.anIntArray160[4] = 37799; class8.anIntArray156[5] = 58316; class8.anIntArray160[5] = 37815; class8.anInt174 = 10586; class8.anInt165 = 10687; class8.anInt200 = 10694; class8.anInt188 = 10681; class8.anInt164 = 10688; class8.anInt181 = 1380; class8.anInt190 = 468; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Infinity top (blu)"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Mystical robes.".getBytes(); } if(i == ####) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[6]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[6]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 55977; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 40854; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 695; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 40847; class8.anIntArray156[2] = 17979; class8.anIntArray160[2] = 37812; class8.anIntArray156[3] = 41920; class8.anIntArray160[3] = 37816; class8.anInt174 = 10583; class8.anInt165 = 10684; class8.anInt200 = 10691; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt181 = 1150; class8.anInt190 = 112; class8.anInt198 = 68; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Infinity hat (blu)"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A mystical hat.".getBytes(); } if(i == ####) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[6]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[6]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 55977; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 40854; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 695; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 40847; class8.anIntArray156[2] = 35365; class8.anIntArray160[2] = 40859; class8.aString170 = "Infinity bottoms (blu)"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Mystical robes.".getBytes(); }

class8.aString170 = "Infinity bottoms (br)"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Mystical robes.".getBytes(); }

Boots & Gloves:

if(i == ####) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[6]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[6]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 10004; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 6803; class8.anInt174 = 2649; class8.anInt165 = 179; class8.anInt200 = 356; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt181 = 930; class8.anInt190 = 0; class8.anInt198 = 828; class8.anInt169 = 8; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Infinity gloves"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Mystical gloves.".getBytes(); } if(i == ####) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[6]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[6]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 695; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 6803; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 43288; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 6810; class8.anInt174 = 10580; class8.anInt165 = 10683; class8.anInt200 = 10690; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt181 = 750; class8.anInt190 = 164; class8.anInt198 = 248; class8.anInt169 = 2; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Infinity boots"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Mystical boots.".getBytes(); }
